sentence.Network_en: She is light - footed when she dances.
She was a good - looking woman, not more than eight - and - thirty , of fair complexion sandy hair well - shape, light - footed.
sentence.Network_cn: 她长得很好看,白皮肤, 黄头发, 身材适中,步履轻盈, 不过三十八岁.

sentence.Network_en: The light went out, and the room was plunged into darkness.
sentence.Network_cn: 灯熄了，屋里陷入一片漆黑。

... light-fingered 手指灵巧的,身手灵活的,善偷窃的 light-footed 脚步轻快的,轻盈的 light-handed 手巧的,手法高明的,缺人手的.
she was a good-looking woman , not more than eight-and-thirty , of fair complexion and sandy hair , well-shape , light-footed .她长得很好看，白皮肤，黄头发，身材适中，步履轻盈，不过三十八岁。

list.abs: She is light - footed when she dances ., 她跳舞时 , 舞步轻盈.
on foot ... foot up to 70 yuan 共计70元 have a light foot 脚步轻快 at the foot of a page 一页的下端.
No one , he slowly , light foot gingerly up to the lake ., 没有人 , 他慢慢的 , 轻手蹑脚的往湖边上去.
所以他用了个term:脚灯(foot light)。也就是说, 般舞台演戏时,有边会打灯光,这个意思就是说,由于嘉年华会是在我们的日常生活 ,它没有跟我们的日常生活.
